author: sobryan
msg: * Removed the Decorators which are incompatible with Portlet 2.0 spec
* Made some minor modifications to BridgeRenderRequestWrapper
* Added dependency on the Portlet 2.0 api
* Added a README.txt file that tells how to build and deploy project
* Changed the POMs to reflect the new 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT version
* Changed the site to generate the 2.0.0 project documentation
